trends: There have been 8 other sightings in East Lansing
There was one other sighting in East Lansing on or around October 7th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to look for the meteor shower and I saw 2 plains flying low near each other and crossing paths I thought they were going to hit each other. I saw a bright glowing round object in the middle of there path the orb was really bright and as soon as the planes got closer to the ufo the ufo ascended quickly and disappeared. I live in Bath township near a lake.
